sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-budget', templateUrl: './create-budget.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-budget.component.css'] }) export class CreateBudgetComponent implements OnInit { budgetForm: FormGroup; loading = false; message = ''; success = false; categories = [ { value: 'INFRASTRUCTURE', label: 'Infrastructure', icon: 'üèóÔ∏è' }, { value: 'EDUCATION', label: '√âducation', icon: 'üéì' }, { value: 'HEALTH', label: 'Sant√©', icon: 'üè•' }, { value: 'SECURITY', label: 'S√©curit√©', icon: 'üõ°Ô∏è' }, { value: 'ENVIRONMENT', label: 'Environnement', icon: 'üåø' }, { value: 'CULTURE', label: 'Culture', icon: 'üé≠' }, { value: 'SPORTS', label: 'Sports', icon: '‚öΩ' }, { value: 'SOCIAL', label: 'Social', icon: 'ü§ù' } ]; fiscalYears = [ { value: 2024, label: '2024' }, { value: 2025, label: '2025' }, { value: 2026, label: '2026' } ]; constructor( private fb: FormBuilder, private http: HttpClient, private router: Router ) { this.budgetForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(5)]], category: ['', Validators.required], fiscalYear: [2025, Validators.required], totalAmount: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.min(1000)]], allocatedAmount: [0], spentAmount: [0], department: ['', Validators.required], startDate: ['', Validators.required], endDate: ['', Validators.required], description: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(20)]], status: ['DRAFT', Validators.required] }); } ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(): void { if (this.budgetForm.invalid) { Object.keys(this.budgetForm.controls).forEach(key => { this.budgetForm.get(key)?.markAsTouched(); }); return; } this.loading = true; this.message = ''; // API call simul√©e setTimeout(() => { this.success = true; this.message = 'Budget cr√©√© avec succ√®s!'; this.loading = false; setTimeout(() => { this.router.navigate(['/dashboard/budget/budgets']); }, 2000); }, 1000); } cancel(): void { this.router.navigate(['/dashboard/budget/budgets']); } }
